body:
Out of curiosity, how is the new hand-picked staff system working out?
I am sorry if I missed a post that it was in (I checked Admin Blog and Official News).

Thank you!
Max
body_tagged:

title: Hand-Picked Staff

replies.body: I don't think any official information was released yet.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think any official information was released yet.

replies.body:
It was just discussed between staff and players and the majority said yes to start it. The hand picked staff will start in March(or the next mod openings)


Edit: Here is the link 
http://avicus.net/forums/c012240d1

replies.body: We haven't started trialing it yet, but we will most likely start sometime near the beginning to middle of March.
replies.body_tagged: We haven't started trialing it yet, but we will most likely start sometime near the beginning to middle of March.

reply_to.body: We haven't started trialing it yet, but we will most likely start sometime near the beginning to middle of March.
reply_to.body_tagged: We haven't started trialing it yet, but we will most likely start sometime near the beginning to middle of March.

replies.body: This is true. We do plan on doing hand picked staff in March. The staff has decided how we will go about doing this already, so no need to worry:) We will notify the community when we start to begin doing hand picked staff.
replies.body_tagged: This is true. We do plan on doing hand picked staff in March. The staff has decided how we will go about doing this already, so no need to worry:) We will notify the community when we start to begin doing hand picked staff.

replies.body: We have not implemented the hand picked staff system as of now. It's expected to be enforced sometime in March.
replies.body_tagged: We have not implemented the hand picked staff system as of now. It's expected to be enforced sometime in March.
